mapper.select: select studentexam_exam from TBL_EXAM_STUDENT where studentexam_student=#{studentId} and studentexam_state=#{state}

select b.* from (select rownum rn,c.* from (select a.totalscore,exam_id,exam_name,exam_classify,to_char(exam_starttime,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss') as EXAM_STARTTIME,to_char(exam_endtime,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss') as EXAM_ENDTIME,exam_time,EXAM_TOTLESCORE from TBL_EXAM t join tbl_totalscore a on totalscore_exam=exam_id where totalscore_student=#{studentId} ) c where rownum < #{end} ) b where b.rn > #{start}
and exam_name like '%'||#{examName}||'%'

select count(*) from TBL_EXAM join tbl_totalscore on totalscore_exam=exam_id where totalscore_student=#{studentId}
and exam_name like '%'||#{examName}||'%'
